Find WiFi Hotspots around Haddiscoe station

Rail replacement locations

Rail replacement bus services pick up and drop off in the station car park. Please note that due to access restrictions, this station can only be served by mini-bus.

Accessible toilets

Step Free Access

This station has step free access to both platforms. However, please note that the station is very rural and Platform 2 (for trains towards Lowestoft) is only accessible via a barrow crossing across the train tracks.

This station is a category B2 station according to ORR station classification system. https://www.orr.gov.uk/media/10955

Assistance meeting point is on the platform, next to the yellow boarding ramp.

No
